description:
I've gotten quite a bit of fan mail about Tevan since he made his debut in "Red Heads Fucking". He has an innocent boy-next-door look, with a body and ass that were made to be fucked.
After getting his ass plowed by Graham, Tevan really wanted to get fucked by Kenny. Tevan has seen Kenny on the website and had the hots for him. They have similar personalities so I thought they would mesh well with each other.
Once together, Tevan became an aggressive bottom and was all over Kenny's big cock. Kenny is a talented top — and the big smile on Tevan's face at the end of this video says it all!
title: Tevan & Kenny
